episode_summary: In this episode, Kim Rittberg shares actionable strategies for real estate agents to leverage video marketing and social media to generate leads and grow their business. She discusses overcoming camera shyness, creating engaging content, and using video to expand one's sphere of influence. The episode provides practical tips and mindset shifts to help agents convert content into cash.
